channel.title: Rasing max hits
channel.description: well as u see i need help on how to raise the max hit off a weapong (ex. whip,dds) also i need help with adding the command ::max with tells you your max hit with the weapon your weilding. if you could help i would be very gratful thanks ash

item.title: Rasing max hits
item.dc:creator: @Scarr Scarr
item.description:
@Scarr wrote:

You just basically said go into Item.Cfg and change the attack bonuses of certain weapons.

Read full topic

item.title: Rasing max hits
item.dc:creator: @1_0wn3d_U_I 1 0wn3d U I
item.description:
@1_0wn3d_U_I wrote:

I don’t know about the ::max command but… For raising the max hits I think you would had to open up the Item.CFG and change the stats from there, as that is also how you make glowing dagger have its high hits, so I am guessing it would have the same effect as that =] Hope it helps.

Read full topic
